title: Stuck at the login, the game simply says "Authenicating"
body: Hey, I've been trying to login for the past 45 minutes. My login is indefinitely stuck at "Authenticating." I've turned off my antivirus and firewall as well as tried switching from the Legacy Client to the Alpha Client and it's yielding the same result. If anyone has had this issue and fixed it, now would be the time to give me some help. Thanks in advance!

replies.body: It seems that your network is failing to establish a connection with the authentication servers, and it's good that you've taken steps to configure your settings.  You can use the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to make sure that the firewall settings were configured accurately!  I also suggest going over each step in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to get this fixed.  Let me know if you have any questions!
